short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for providing and delivering hydraulic oil to the Department of National Defence.
description: This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) cancels and supersedes the previous RFSO number W8486-228586/A (CW2254770) dated September 27 2022. It is for the procurement of hydraulic oil to the Department of National Defence. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by November 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

## Solicitation Title
Hydraulic Oil

## Solicitation ID
WS4235991630

## Solicitation Status
Expired

## Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Amendment to the previous Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply and delivery of hydraulic oil to the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4235991630
* Solicitation Type: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Currency of Bid Response: $
* Period of Standing Offer:
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: November 1, 2023
	+ Expected Contract End Date: October 31, 2025
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

## Solicitation Requirements
The required goods are hydraulic oils, which will be used by the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Tendering Requirements
All tenderers must submit their bids by November 3, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.

## Notice and Bidding Documents
Please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639357](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17639357) for more information and to access the bidding documents.

## Contact Information
* Caroline Wolszczan (SPAC/PSPC) (caroline.wolszczan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Moral du texte : Ce texte se présente comme un avertissement aux concédants d'affaires intéressés par l'offre de déclaration de standing (RFSO) pour la fourniture et la livraison d'huile hydraulique à la Défense nationale. Il comprend des informations spécifiques sur le nombre du projet, le titre, le type, le statut, les détails et les exigences du projet.
